Reviews.Title: “Modern, Free Internet & Value for Money!”
Reviews.Author: Ti_Chan
Reviews.Content: booked via bookingcom rate 95 usdnight dec 2010 stayed 6 nights 203 • newly renovated modern design aircon empty fridge cool drinks lcd tv safety box cleaning immaculate • location 10 mins walk tst mtr near bustling nathan road hear noises • free internet lan cable wifi • free upgrade harbor view • supermarket corner stock food supplies • helpful staff husband actually lost passport hong kong staff help police call time checked dislike • taxi hotel printed maps remember review mentioning hotel steep hill there’s 1 steep corner • – unlike pictures website i’m stay guess difference vs pictures hardly suitcase • giant dumpster front hotel don’t smelly overall value money stay hotels 23 times expensive corner stay hesitation you’re fussy yourself you’ll enjoy stay
